授業方法:
Face to face format. In addition to teacher instruction, students will work individually, with partners, in small groups and in whole class activities to develop communication skills, and engage in independent/group research for oral and written assignments.

Please note that the class format may change depending on guidelines from the university.

[Information for students permitted to take classes online]
Arrangements will be made to provide access to the class as a simultaneous two-way class via Zoom.
